results.title: Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension
results.text_hl: ...CCBs, like @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Thiazides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D049971 @@@thiazide@@@-type diuretics are recommended as initial therapy for Black @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, including those with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang JG, Palmer BF, Vogel Anderson K, Sever P. Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich). 2023 Aug 7;():. PMID: 37551050
citations.BibTeX: @article{37551050, title={Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension}, author={Wang JG and Palmer BF and Vogel Anderson K and Sever P}, journal={J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich)}}

results.title: Effects of antihypertensive agents on the quality of life in diabetic hypertensive patients: A prospective study
results.text_hl: Both @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ have shown maximum change in the @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@QOLID-PV@@@ score (30.94% and 30.56%, respectively) as compared to other groups.

citations.NLM: Bhardwaj RK, Kazal HL, Kohli K, Raj R, Bansal N, Singh B, Arora H. Effects of antihypertensive agents on the quality of life in diabetic hypertensive patients: A prospective study Perspect Clin Res. 2022 Jul-Sep;13(3):137-144. PMID: 35928647
citations.BibTeX: @article{35928647, title={Effects of antihypertensive agents on the quality of life in diabetic hypertensive patients: A prospective study}, author={Bhardwaj RK and Kazal HL and Kohli K and Raj R and Bansal N and Singh B and Arora H}, journal={Perspect Clin Res}, volume={13}, number={3}, pages={137-144}}

results.title: Antihypertensive treatment improves glycemic control in patients with newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes mellitus: A prospective cohort study
results.text_hl: The antihypertensive cohort received 5 milligrams of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ once daily in tandem with standard @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Li JC, Cheng PC, Huang CN, Jian LF, Wu YS, Lin CL. Antihypertensive treatment improves glycemic control in patients with newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes mellitus: A prospective cohort study Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2022;13():935561. PMID: 36157468

results.title: In vitro and in silico studies and a systematic literature review of antiglycation properties of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: In vitro and in silico studies and a systematic literature review of antiglycation properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: Fixed-dose combination of amlodipine and atorvastatin improves clinical outcomes in patients with concomitant hypertension and dyslipidemia.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, as an unexpected result, a higher risk to develop new-onset @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ was observed with FEC regimens (hazard ratio, 2.19; 95% CI, 1.6 to 3.0).

citations.NLM: Lin CP, Tung YC, Hsiao FC, Yang CH, Kao YW, Lin YS, Chu YC, Chu PH. Fixed-dose combination of amlodipine and atorvastatin improves clinical outcomes in patients with concomitant hypertension and dyslipidemia. J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich). 2020 Oct;22(10):1846-1853. PMID: 32862551

results.title: Clinical Management of Metabolic Syndrome Among the Population Attending Geriatric Outpatient Clinics in Qatar.
results.text_hl: The most commonly prescribed medications for treatment included @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ for @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ for @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ reduction, and @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@ for cardiovascular management.

citations.NLM: Mohieldeen Osman S, Sathian B, Bhaskaran B, Ramadan M, Saleh H, Abbas A, Al Hamad H. Clinical Management of Metabolic Syndrome Among the Population Attending Geriatric Outpatient Clinics in Qatar. Cureus. 2024 Aug;16(8):e67826. PMID: 39323693
citations.BibTeX: @article{39323693, title={Clinical Management of Metabolic Syndrome Among the Population Attending Geriatric Outpatient Clinics in Qatar.}, author={Mohieldeen Osman S and Sathian B and Bhaskaran B and Ramadan M and Saleh H and Abbas A and Al Hamad H}, journal={Cureus}, volume={16}, number={8}, pages={e67826}}

results.title: The Indian registry on current patient profiles & treatment trends in hypertension (RECORD): One year interim analysis
results.text_hl: Equal proportions of participants with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ were on @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ monotherapy (29.4%).

citations.NLM: Rajadhyaksha GC, Reddy H, Singh AK, Oomman A, Adhyapak SM. The Indian registry on current patient profiles & treatment trends in hypertension (RECORD): One year interim analysis Indian J Med Res. 2023 Sep;158(3):244-255. PMID: 37861623

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ Ameliorates @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@Ischemia@@@-Induced Neovascularization in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ through Endothelial Progenitor Cell Mobilization

results.title: Uptitrating amlodipine significantly reduces blood pressure in diabetic patients with hypertension: a retrospective, pooled analysis
results.text_hl: Uptitrating @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ significantly reduces blood pressure in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@: a retrospective, pooled analysis

results.title: Amlodipine added to quinapril vs quinapril alone for the treatment of hypertension in diabetes: the Amlodipine in Diabetes (ANDI) trial.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ added to @CHEMICAL_Quinapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077583 @@@quinapril@@@ vs @CHEMICAL_Quinapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077583 @@@quinapril@@@ alone for the treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@: the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ (ANDI) trial.
